template.description: ETL pipeline on Nifi built by Alex Everitt and Chris Maltais
template.name: ETL Pipeline

entry.value:
tier2.sources = src2 tier2.channels = channel2 tier2.sinks = sink2
tier2.sources.src2.type = org.apache.flume.source.kafka.KafkaSource tier2.sources.src2.kafka.topics = Error tier2.sources.src2.kafka.consumer.group.id = error tier2.sources.src2.channels = channel2
tier2.channels.channel2.type = memory tier2.channels.channel2.capacity = 200000 tier2.channels.channel2.transactionCapacity = 20000
tier2.sinks.sink2.type = hdfs tier2.sinks.sink2.hdfs.path = hdfs://sandbox-hdp.hortonworks.com:8020/user/admin/output tier2.sinks.sink2.hdfs.useLocalTimeStamp = true tier2.sinks.sink2.hdfs.filePrefix = WarnTopic_netIDs-%{host}-%d-%H tier2.sinks.sink2.hdfs.batchSize = 500000 tier2.sinks.sink2.hdfs.rollSize = 0 tier2.sinks.sink2.hdfs.rollCount = 0 tier2.sinks.sink2.hdfs.rollInterval = 0 tier2.sinks.sink2.hdfs.fileType = DataStream tier2.sinks.sink2.channel = channel2

tier1.sources = src1 tier1.channels = channel1 tier1.sinks = sink1
tier1.sources.src1.type = org.apache.flume.source.kafka.KafkaSource tier1.sources.src1.kafka.topics = Error tier1.sources.src1.kafka.consumer.group.id = error tier1.sources.src1.channels = channel1
tier1.channels.channel1.type = memory tier1.channels.channel1.capacity = 100000 tier1.channels.channel1.transactionCapacity = 10000
tier1.sinks.sink1.type = hdfs tier1.sinks.sink1.hdfs.path = hdfs://sandbox-hdp.hortonworks.com:8020/user/admin/output tier1.sinks.sink1.hdfs.useLocalTimeStamp = true tier1.sinks.sink1.hdfs.filePrefix = ErrorTopic_netIDs-%{host}-%d tier1.sinks.sink1.hdfs.batchSize = 500000 tier1.sinks.sink1.hdfs.rollSize = 0 tier1.sinks.sink1.hdfs.rollCount = 0 tier1.sinks.sink1.hdfs.rollInterval = 0 tier1.sinks.sink1.hdfs.fileType = DataStream tier1.sinks.sink1.channel = channel1
INSERT INTO a3space.results (logtype, timestamp, count) values ('$1', '$2', $3)
